title: How to Make Chicken Shawarma (Arabic Style)

steps.headline: Cut chicken into thin slices.
steps.description: Add little olive oil, little lemon juice, salt and if you want it to be spicy you can add chilli powder. Marinate them for 2 hours.

steps.headline: To make sauce, put garlic paste, lemon juice(little), yoghurt/curd, salt to taste in a bowl.
steps.description: Mix these ingredients and there comes the yummy Shawarma sauce.

steps.headline: After 2 hours take out the chicken and add it into the frying pan.
steps.description: Add a little oil and keep moving chicken in the pan to different parts until they are little brown. Take them out and add to a plate.

steps.headline: Take out pita bread (Soft one, which can make a pocket).
steps.description: Add chicken into it. Add some lettuce (nicely chopped), coriander leaves (nicely chopped), tomato slices and french fries. Add the sauce. Roll the pita bread, cover it from down using sandwich papers or aluminum foil. Shawarma Sandwich is Ready!

steps.headline: Marinate the chicken.
steps.description: Make a marinade consisting of the ginger and garlic paste, salt and olive oil. Place the chicken into it. Leave to marinate for some time.

steps.headline: Bake the marinated chicken in the oven until cooked.
steps.description: Remove and allow to cool down enough to handle.

steps.headline: Chop the chicken into bite size portions.
steps.description: Arrange on the pita or unleavened bread.

steps.headline: Add chopped lettuce or cabbage.
steps.description: Spread the curd on and add some hummus too.

steps.headline: Roll in foil or sandwich wrap to keep intact.

text: Spicy chicken shawarma Cut chicken into thin slices. Add little olive oil, little lemon juice, salt and if you want it to be spicy you can add chilli powder. Marinate them for 2 hours. To make sauce, put garlic paste, lemon juice(little), yoghurt/curd, salt to taste in a bowl. Mix these ingredients and there comes the yummy Shawarma sauce. After 2 hours take out the chicken and add it into the frying pan. Add a little oil and keep moving chicken in the pan to different parts until they are little brown. Take them out and add to a plate. Take out pita bread (Soft one, which can make a pocket). Add chicken into it. Add some lettuce (nicely chopped), coriander leaves (nicely chopped), tomato slices and french fries. Add the sauce. Roll the pita bread, cover it from down using sandwich papers or aluminum foil. Shawarma Sandwich is Ready! Non spicy chicken shawarma Marinate the chicken. Make a marinade consisting of the ginger and garlic paste, salt and olive oil. Place the chicken into it. Leave to marinate for some time. Bake the marinated chicken in the oven until cooked. Remove and allow to cool down enough to handle. Chop the chicken into bite size portions. Arrange on the pita or unleavened bread. Add chopped lettuce or cabbage. Spread the curd on and add some hummus too. Roll in foil or sandwich wrap to keep intact.  Serve immediately.
